thread.title: Veer Naris: Veer Naris, Soldiers Felicitated
thread.title_full: Veer Naris: Veer Naris, Soldiers Felicitated | - Times of India

title: Veer Naris: Veer Naris, Soldiers Felicitated
text: Thiruvananthapuram: Governor Arif Mohammed Khan felicitated the Veer Naris (war widows) and soldiers at Pangode military camp on Friday. The governor commended the Army leadership for the “Ma Matti Mathrubhumi” theme for Army Day which has “mother” as the common factor.The incredible women with unmatched strength - Veer Naris, serving soldiers with dedication and living legends who displayed enormous courage while being on bonafide military duty with their incomparable sacrifices and contributions to the nation, were felicitated by the governor on the occasion.As part of the event a display arena of new generation equipment utilized for humanitarian assistance and disaster relief operation during flood relief efforts undertaken in Tuticorin district, by the troops of Pangode military station were displayed.We also published the following articles recentlyWedding organised for three women brought up in Nari NiketanThree women, two of them deaf and dumb, who were separated from their families in early childhood and brought up in Nari Niketan, tied the nuptial knot at a wedding ceremony sponsored by the director of Motion Education. Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla attended the ceremony and blessed the newly wedded couples.106972748Soldiers not only vigilant guards, but also symbol of sacrifice: GuvGovernor Kalraj Mishra felicitated 11 people, including Veer Naari, Veera Mata, and Veer Pitah, as Rajasthan celebrated the 8th Veterans Day. Soldiers are vigilant guards of the country's borders, symbolizing sacrifice and dedication. Efforts will be made to encourage veterans and support their families.106849195Anuj, Shoiab felicitated by DBSAAnuj Uppal and Shoiab Khan, two ace cueists, were felicitated by DBSA for their performance at the National Games and senior billiards and snooker Nationals. Uppal won bronze in the 6-Red snooker category at the Goa National Games, while Khan secured bronze in the same discipline at the Chennai Nationals.106886952
